history.p: According to his diary, Nielsen composed the melody on 24 December 1914. It might originally have been intended for the first volume of En Snes danske Viser (1915, CNW Coll. 9). For some unknown reason, the melody was only later included in the second volume of 1917.

bibl.label: Barndom
bibl.author: Anne-Marie Reynolds
bibl.title: Carl Nielsen's Voice. His Songs in Context
